pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatio-Temporal Bayesian Modelling // Fits, spatially predicts and temporally forecasts large amounts of space-time data using [1] Bayesian Gaussian Process (GP) Models, [2] Bayesian Auto- Regressive (AR) Models, and [3] Bayesian Gaussian Predictive Processes (GPP) based AR Models for spatio-temporal big-n problems. Bakar and Sahu (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v063.i15.
